name: protip
description: A new generation jQuery Tooltip plugin.

scripts.build-test: browserify -t html2js-browserify test/test.js -o bundle.test.js && npm run-script sass
scripts.build-prod: browserify -t html2js-browserify main.js -o bundle.js && npm run-script sass && minify --output protip.min.js bundle.js && minify --output protip.min.css css/protip.css
scripts.build-all: npm run build-test && npm run build-prod

author: Victor Vincent <wintercounter@gmail.com>
